subject: HAPPY NEW YEAR
body:
HAPPY NEW YEAR
My name is Peter Manto, and my only elder sister's name is Mary Manto, and as you might have noticed, she's suffering from kidney disease and is currently undergoing dialysis to keep herself alive. I know that she contacted you before to tell you about our mother's gold bars that were kept by a security company. We kindly request your assistance in claiming, monetizing, and investing the proceeds for a monthly or quarterly influx to support our educational needs. Could you kindly provide us with your plans for this? We extend our sincerest wishes for a prosperous new year to you.
Thanks, Manto

subject: Re: HAPPY NEW YEAR
body:
Hello Peter Manto,

Happy New Year to you too! I'm sorry to hear about your sister Mary's health condition. It must be a challenging time for both of you.

Regarding the gold bars, it's quite an interesting situation. I'd love to help in any way I can, but I need more information before we proceed. Could you please provide more details about these gold bars? How did your mother come into possession of them and why were they kept with a security company?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Janet

subject: Re: HAPPY NEW YEAR
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really excited to share some information with you. Can we start discussing it?

Best wishes,
Janet

subject: Re: HAPPY NEW YEAR
body:
Hello there,

I hope you're having a great day! I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details? I'm all ears and ready to understand better. 

Just a quick note, though, I'd prefer not to share any personal information at this stage. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Janet

subject: Re: HAPPY NEW YEAR
body:
Hello there,

I hope you're having a great day! I'm always eager to learn and share information. What's the topic you'd like to discuss today?

Best wishes,
Janet
